content: **crocheted mouse for cats in drops lima ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no li-128 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference approx 12 cm length approx 10 cm without tail **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 2923 goldenrod 50 g colour 3145 powder pink and use left-over e g 0519 dark grey for eyes and whiskers 1 mouse weighs approx 12 g without wadding **crochet gauge** 20 double crochets in width and 20 row in height = 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size accessories wadding
